goals__remit:
NCTM is one of the leading law firms in Italy. Our strengths are more than 250 professionals including the 49 active and dynamic equity partners who drive the firm, offices in Milan, Rome, London, Brussels and Shanghai, a vocation for innovation and independence and a great client base. 
 
We deliver integrated legal services to enterprises and financial institutions through multidisciplinary teams reflecting client needs. We believe the growth in the number and needs of our clients is testimony to the success of our strengths and our culture.
